docs.lead_paragraph: On the second day of the forty-second annual appeal of the New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, contributions amounted to $106,599.84, of which $18,419.42 was donated yesterday by 302 persons.

headline.main: GIFTS FOR NEEDIEST RAISED TO $106,599; 302 Contributors Add $18,419 to Fund on Second Day of the 42d Annual Appeal $5,000 CHECK IS RECEIVED $1 and $5 Donations, Too, Help Swell Total -- Many Warming Letters Reach The Times

docs.snippet: On the second day of the forty-second annual appeal of the New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, contributions amounted to $106,599.84, of which $18,419.42 was donated yesterday by 302 persons.
